glsa.title: Unbound: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: Multiple Denial of Service vulnerabilities were found in Unbound.

background.p: Unbound is a validating, recursive, and caching DNS resolver.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in unbound. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could cause a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Unbound users should upgrade to the latest version:
